original: Österblom, Erik Konrad Mattias, landsfiskal, Bräkne-Hoby, f. 2:5/2/04 i Hällieberga, Kronob. 1., av ryttm. F. Ö. o. Anna Carlsson. G. 34 m. Inez Månsson. Barn: Ann-Gret f. 34, Bengt 38, Ulf 43. — Landsfiskalsex. 25. Res. t. Tyskl., Tjeckoslov. 29, Norge f. stud. av rättegångsförfar. 46. E. landskansl. 24, e. landsfiskal 31, landsfiskal i Hoby distr. fr. 32. V. ordf. i Smål. Banks avd :kont. 42, ordf. i Hoby G. o. IF 35, i Hoby skyttefören. 40, v. ordf. i Blek. fotb-.förb. 45, styrded. där fr. 38, Blek. gymn:förb. 37, hälsoviförb. 42, skytte-förb. 41, ordf. i Bräkne-Hoby byggn:-nd 3’3, hälsov:nd 38. Hobbies: idr., jakt, fiske. Hoby G. o. IFs GM, Blek. idrrförb. SM, ftjt i silver, Blek. jakt-v:fören. SM, Sv. jägiförb. hed:t i silv., idr:m., skidl:m., skytteim., alla i guld.
translated: Österblom, Erik Konrad Mattias, district fiscal, Bräkne-Hoby, born on 5th February 1904 in Hällieberga, Kronob. Son of Lieutenant Colonel F. Ö. and Anna Carlsson. Married in 1934 to Inez Månsson. Children: Ann-Gret born in 1934, Bengt in 1938, Ulf in 1943. - District fiscal since 1925. Resided in Germany, Czechoslovakia in 1929, and Norway for the study of legal proceedings in 1946. Employed as a state official since 1924, promoted to district fiscal in 1931 and served in the Hoby district from 1932. Vice chairman of the Småland Bank's departmental committee since 1942, chairman of the Hoby Gymnastics and Sports Club since 1935, chairman of the Hoby Shooting Association since 1940, vice chairman of the Blekinge Football Association since 1945, serving on the board since 1938. Member of the Blekinge Gymnastics Association since 1937, the Health Association since 1942, and the Shooting Association since 1941. Chairman of the Bräkne-Hoby Building Committee since 1933, and the Health Committee since 1938. Hobbies: sports, hunting, fishing. Achievements: winner of the Hoby Gymnastics and Sports Club Grand Master, Swedish champions in athletics, silver medalist, Blekinge Hunting and Fishing Association Swedish champions, honorary distinctions in silver from the Swedish Jäger Association, achievements in sports, skiing, shooting, all in gold.

achievements: Hoby Gymnastics and Sports Club Grand Master
Blekinge Hunting and Fishing Association Swedish Champions
Honors in Silver from the Swedish Jäger Association (Sports, Skiing, Shooting)
